thread.title: BRIEF-GDS Partners With SDIC, China Unicom, And China Telecom For Data Center Development In Upcoming Markets In China

title: BRIEF-GDS Partners With SDIC, China Unicom, And China Telecom For Data Center Development In Upcoming Markets In China

organizations.name: china telecom for data center development
china telecom for data center development in upcoming markets in china reuters staff

text:
#Market News January 4, 2018 / 11:29 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-GDS Partners With SDIC, China Unicom, And China Telecom For Data Center Development In Upcoming Markets In China Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 4 (Reuters) - GDS Holdings Ltd: 
* GDS PARTNERS WITH SDIC, CHINA UNICOM, AND CHINA TELECOM FOR DATA CENTER DEVELOPMENT IN UPCOMING MARKETS IN CHINA 
* GDS HOLDINGS LTD - ‍ENTERED LOI WITH SDIC, CHINA UNICOM, AND CHINA TELECOM FOR DATA CENTER DEVELOPMENT IN UPCOMING MARKETS IN CHINA​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
